author: Bouh
description:
Easy to use this extention give you actions, conditions, and expressions for controllers.
You can connect multiple gamepads and play all together.
name: Controllers

eventsFunctions.description: Return pressure of trigger given for specifed controller
eventsFunctions.name: E_pressure_trigger

parameters.description: Enter the number of player, 1, 2, 3 or 4 (Number)
parameters.name: player_ID

eventsFunctions.description: Return value of axis given for specifed stick with specifed player
eventsFunctions.name: E_Axis_factor

parameters.description: Enter the number of player, 1, 2, 3 or 4 (Number)
parameters.name: player_ID

eventsFunctions.description: Return the index of last button used
eventsFunctions.name: E_Get_LastButton

parameters.description: Enter the number of player, 1, 2, 3 or 4 (Number)
parameters.name: player_ID

eventsFunctions.description: Test if a button is pressed
eventsFunctions.name: C_Button_pressed

parameters.description: Enter the number of player, 1, 2, 3 or 4 (Number)
parameters.name: player_ID

parameters.description: ---XBOX: A, B, X, Y, LB , RB, LT, RT, BACK, START | ---PS4: CROSS, SQUARE, CIRCLE, TRIANGLE, L1, L2, R1, R2, SHARE, OPTIONS, PS_BUTTON, CLICK_TOUCHPAD | ---ANY: UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT, CLICK_STICK_LEFT, CLICK_STICK_RIGHT
parameters.name: button

eventsFunctions.description: Return value of deadzone for sticks
eventsFunctions.name: E_Get_deadzone

eventsFunctions.description: Test if a axis is pushed
eventsFunctions.name: C_Axis_pushed

eventsFunctions.description: Check if player use specific controller
eventsFunctions.name: E_Controller_type

eventsFunctions.description: Check if player use specific controller
eventsFunctions.name: C_Controller_type

parameters.description: Time in second (Optionnel, default value is 1)
parameters.name: duration
